sentence.Network_en: As a dramatist I hate to moralize.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一名剧作家，我憎恨说教。

sentence.Network_en: Shakespeare is, by common consent, the greatest English dramatist.

sentence.Network_en: Beside Shakespeare, Marlowe strikes us as an immature dramatist, especially in his comic scenes.

list.abs: He has a bright future as a dramatist ., 作为一个剧作家 , 他前途光明.
